feature.name: Quiz Creation Tool
feature.description: Empower educators, marketers, and content creators to design and publish quizzes that inform, engage, and capture leads. This intuitive tool offers a comprehensive set of features to create dynamic quizzes that cater to various learning styles and assessment needs.

keyFunctionalities.name: Versatile Question Editor
keyFunctionalities.description: Craft diverse question types (multiple choice, true/false, short answer) and integrate multimedia elements (images, videos) for a richer learning experience.

keyFunctionalities.name: Quiz Customization
keyFunctionalities.description: Set time limits, establish scoring mechanisms (points per correct, penalty per incorrect, no penalty), and define difficulty levels to tailor assessments to specific goals.

keyFunctionalities.name: Theme and Branding
keyFunctionalities.description: Personalize the quiz interface with pre-designed themes, custom backgrounds, logos, and color schemes to match your brand identity or educational setting.

keyFunctionalities.name: Analytics and Reporting
keyFunctionalities.description: Gain valuable insights into quiz performance through detailed reports on completion rates, question-level analysis, and user feedback. Track progress, identify areas for improvement, and optimize future quizzes based on data.

keyFunctionalities.name: Seamless Integration and Sharing
keyFunctionalities.description: Effortlessly share quizzes across social media platforms (Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn) to expand reach and capture leads. Integrate with Learning Management Systems (LMS) using SCORM and xAPI standards for easy deployment within existing educational frameworks.

keyFunctionalities.name: Accessibility and Responsive Design
keyFunctionalities.description: Ensure quizzes are accessible to a wider audience by adhering to WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility standards. Responsive design guarantees optimal viewing experiences across various devices (desktops, tablets, smartphones).

benefits.description: Enhanced Learning: Interactive quizzes promote active learning and knowledge retention.
Improved Assessment: Gain valuable data on learner performance and identify areas for improvement.
Increased Engagement: Boost audience participation with visually appealing and interactive quizzes.
Lead Generation: Capture valuable leads through engaging quizzes integrated with marketing campaigns.
Content Optimization: Analyze quiz results to tailor content based on audience needs and interests.
